description: A camping cookset you can use over an open fire. Made of durable stainless steel, the 2 pots and frying pan don’t have plastic handles that could melt under flame. Use them to dish up a couple of portions of pasta for hungry campers – they work just as nicely on a campstove if there’s no kindling nearby.Set includes Primus Campfire 21cm frying pan, and 1L and 1.8L pots (plus lids with strainers).18/8 stainless steel construction is reliable and lasts a long time.Frying pan has machined aluminum clad bottom for even heat distribution (your food only touches stainless steel).Pots have folding handles with an indent to stabilize them when you’re hanging them over a fire.Pan handle folds up to store it in your camp kit.Stackable and pack into the included storage bag.
name: Primus Campfire Cookset Small
